title: For Surrender of the gross area of the land which is subjected to acquisition, free of cost and free
clause_text: For Surrender of the gross area of the land which is subjected to acquisition, free of cost and free from all encumbrances, the owner shall be entitled for TDR or DR irrespective of the FSI permissible or development potential of the very said land to be surrender and also that of land surrounding to such land at the rate as given below:-
section: GENERATION OF THE TRANSFERABLE DEVELOPMENT RIGHTS ( TDR )
